snippet: A military panel has recommended transferring a Yemeni detainee in the first results of a long-delayed initiative to hold parole-like hearings at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.
abstract: Military panel recommends transferring Yemeni detainee in the first results of a long-delayed initiative to hold parole-like hearings at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; Mahmoud al Mujahid had been considered too dangerous to let go under any conditions.
lead_paragraph: A military panel has recommended transferring a Yemeni detainee in the first results of a long-delayed initiative to hold parole-like hearings at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.

headline.main: Panel Recommends Transferring Yemeni From Guantánamo
headline.print_headline: U.S. Panel Recommends Transferring Yemeni Detainee From Guantánamo
